components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Receipt Delays to Multiple Networks in the U.S. from a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience MMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to multiple networks in the United States from a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to multiple networks in the United States from a subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the Incidents for each affected Country. The following Countries and respective Network Operators are impacted:

- Guinea: Celcom
- Mozambique: Vodacom
- Tanzania: TTCL

We’re seeing recovery for these countries:

- Tanzanaia: Viettel
- Mali: Telecel
- Somalia: Hormuud Telecom

We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 25 May 08:00 until 25 May 13:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Japan (JP1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in JP1.

affected_components.name: INTERCONNECT

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 May 2024 at 05:00 PDT until 27 May 2024 at 06:59 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Australia phone numbers.

The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT until 29 May 2024 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT until 22 May 2024 at 02:00 PDT
28 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT until 29 May 2024 at 02:00 PDT
